HomePage.title: Welcome to
HomePage.about: TesteBac prepares students for the baccalaureate or college entrance exam. This platform is dedicated to students who want to test their knowledge and prepare for the important exams of their lives. The platform uses a grid test system, which provides instant feedback and helps students improve their knowledge. The tests are structured by subjects and chapters, to provide the most efficient and personalized preparation. To get started, choose the subject and chapter you want and press the start button. Good luck with your studies!

userNotAuthorized.title: Registration not accepted yet
userNotAuthorized.message:
Please wait for your registration to be validated by a moderator. This may take up to 24 hours. 

If you have any questions, please contact us at {email}.
userNotAuthorized.short: You need to be authorized to access the app.

Old.subject: Sign in to TesteBac
Old.title: Sign in to TesteBac ({host})
Old.message:
Thank you for registering on TesteBac. Your registration is pending approval by a moderator. This process may take up to 24 hours. 

If you have any questions, please contact us at {email}.
Old.disclaimer: If you did not request this email you can safely ignore it. You can try to login but you will receive an error now. You will be able to login after your registration is approved by a moderator.
Old.text_alt: If you have trouble clicking the "{signIn}" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser: {signInLink}

MagicLink.subject: Sign in to TesteBac
MagicLink.title: Sign in to TesteBac ({host})
MagicLink.disclaimer: If you did not request this email you can safely ignore it. Contact support if you have any questions at {email}.

Account.title: Account
Account.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
Account.deleteSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully.
Account.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again later.

username.label: Username
username.error: The username is required and must be at least 3 characters long.

email.label: Email
email.error: The email is required and must be a valid email address.

authorized.label: Authorization
authorized.description: The user's authorized to use the app.

fetch.title: {error, select, Unauthorized {Unauthorized} other {General error}}
fetch.message: {error, select, Unauthorized {You are not authorized to access this administration page. If you believe this is an error, refresh the page and try again later.} other {Unknown general error. Please try again later.}}

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.description: Here you can see your progress and the tests you have taken. You can also see your results and the subjects you have studied. Keep up the good work and good luck with your studies!
